src:
Prabowo Safari ke Sesama Menteri, Berawal dari Luhut
07 Nov 2019, 22:49 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Menteri Pertahanan Prabowo Subianto berencana melakukan safari ke seluruh kantor menteri. Kunjungan pertamanya, Prabowo sowan ke kantor Menteri Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan.
"Saya sedang keliling ke semua menteri," kata Prabowo di gedung BPPT, seperti dikutip Antara, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Prabowo mengatakan kunjungannya ke kantor Luhut itu untuk meminta saran dan masukan tentang pertahanan. Apalagi, mantan Komandan Kodiklat TNI AD TNI itu merupakan seniornya.
"Beliau senior saya, beliau juga menko bidang maritim. Tentu saya minta saran, minta pemikiran beliau," kata Prabowo.
Sebelumnya, Prabowo menyambangi kantor Luhut sekitar pukul 16.50 WIB. Prabowo baru terlihat keluar dari kantor Luhut sekitar pukul 18.30 WIB.
Sayangnya, dari kunjungan itu, Prabowo tak memberikan bocoran terkait saran apa saja yang diberikan oleh Luhut.

(idn/gbr)
text:
Prabowo Safari to Fellow Ministers, Starting from Luhut
Nov 7 2019, 22:49 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto plans to conduct safaris to all ministerial offices. His first visit, Prabowo Sowan, to the office of the Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan.
"I am traveling to all ministers," Prabowo said at the BPPT building, as quoted by Antara, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Prabowo said his visit to the Luhut office was to seek advice and input on defense. Moreover, the former Commander of the Indonesian Military Army is a senior.
"He is my senior, he is also Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs. Of course I ask for advice, ask for his thoughts," said Prabowo.
Previously, Prabowo visited Luhut's office around 16.50 WIB. Prabowo was seen leaving the Luhut office at around 18:30 West Indonesia Time.
Unfortunately, from that visit, Prabowo did not provide any leaks regarding any advice given by Luhut.

(idn / pic)
